name: Pillage the Pigs
description:
WORK IN PROGRESS

Description
A Powerful King seeks revenge against the innocent pigs for the trauma that was caused to him years ago. His precious ice cream cone was tragically knocked out of his hands by one of the innocent pigs.

Play as the deranged King and claim revenge on the pigs by destroying as much of their possessions as possible before law enforcement arrives!

Controls

Keyboard:

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Attack: F
  • Throw Axe: D
  • Sprint: A
  • Interact with doors and windows: Up Arrow
  • Restart level: R
  • Pause: Escape

Xbox Controller:

  • Move: Left Thumbstick
  • Jump: A
  • Attack: X
  • Throw Axe: B
  • Sprint: Right Bumper
  • Interact with doors and windows: Up on Left ThumbStick
  • Restart level: Back
  • Pause: Start

Development Insight
This is currently a prototype project I am working on as a learning experience / passion project. Join me and give feedback while I develop this game over the next year.

This and later versions will be free to play until I reach a point where the core gameplay loop and concepts are solidified. Afterwards, I will decide whether I put in the game in an alpha/beta phase with restricted access.

As of this version, 90% of the art and animations come from https://pixel-frog.itch.io/kings-and-pigs, used as placeholder for now to focus on gameplay, programming and level design.

All the other work you see is done solely by myself.
